menu.note: Available on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday from 5 PM

items.name: Hyd Chicken Dum Biryani
items.description: Traditional dum-cooked chicken biryani with authentic Hyderabadi spices.

items.name: Hyd Veg Dum Biryani

items.name: Egg Biryani
